title: Avangrid invests in more made-in-USA power transformers
description: Avangrid announced a $7 million investment to purchase five power transformers from WEG Transformers USA in Washington, Missouri.
content: Avangrid announced a $7 million investment to purchase five power transformers from WEG Transformers USA in Washington, Missouri.
